title: Woke up to raided base with reskinned door?
selftext: So I just woke up and my base was raided, I spawned nearby and ran back and the roof door was open and reskinned but I still have the code to it. The rest of the base was raided with satchels. I remember closing the roof door being closed but I could be wrong. How did they reskin it while it’s still locked though?
